item.title: Understanding Timestamps and Timezones
item.description: Dates Dates are generally formed of 3 triplets, namely, {Day, Month, Year}. This already can create a lot of confusion around the world as they are ordered differently. For example, the date {16, 02, 2014} can be written as: Additionally, there are many ways to seperate these triplets. Some use / whereas others use - and .. All this variation was sandardized using the ISO-8601. Timestamps This standard allows us the view the same time regardless of where we live.
